author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Grate the cucumber into a bowl, making sure you catch all the juice. Stir in the ginger, apple juice and lime juice. Seive the mixture into a jug, pressing down on the pulp to extract as much juice as possible.  Pour into two tall glasses.
ingredients: ½ cucumber,  1 tsp grated root ginger,  400ml/14fl oz apple juice,  ½ lime, juice only
